message:
What do you use for testing iOS and Safari when you don't have a Mac or and iPhone?  

what I mean by testing is console error messages and functionality not screen resolutions

Edit:
testing web applications I mean

data.message: If I am geting it right, I think you can use any OS and any browser to test you web app that way.
No what I mean is cross browser testing to check if my app is working on all browsers , I can already test it on chrome and firefox and IE but I can't test it on Safari or iOS
So, I think there is Safari for windows
I think it's an old version (like 5 or something)

Also, There is alot of online testing service but most of them for just rendering or how your website will look in deffrant browsers, But try https://spoon.net/browsers/ , Also i found this like using google http://www.sitepoint.com/testing-in-safari-without-a-mac/ , hope it help
ok thanks, I'll check them out :)
Unfortunately,  you can't compile iOS apps on any other OS but OSX  ... you can use OSX VMware image but it will be slow
